title: Fix tone issue related to the default constructor of GPTResearcher

body: The constructor of GPTResearcher was unable to pick up the default tone when none was provided, causing an issue when calling GPTResearcher without specifying a tone. This change will fix this bug.

Thanks @0x11c11e 

@assafelovic I believe we'll need this one for the Langgraph Cloud support - the Multi_agents API can be deployed to Langgraph Cloud cleanly but is throwing an error regarding not getting a tone param when querying it via the frontend
